page.title: 11 Types of houses we live in.
page.content: In Tamworth there are {three main types} of houses that people live in, terraced, semi-detached and detached. A terraced house is joined on both sides to the houses next to it though it may have a passageway through to the rear. A semi-detached house is joined on just one side and a detached house, as the name suggests, is not attached to the houses next door to it. A {typical semi-detached house} will probably have three bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs. Downstairs there will be a large kitchen, a living room and a lounge. The house may well have a garage and a large garden to the rear. Some semi-detached houses may have a greenhouse or a garden shed.
